BasicInfo.short: Gizmoz develops proprietary patented 3D and animation technology to let users express themselves by creating realistic 3D characters.

Products.name: Gizmoz
Products.description: Gizmoz is a community of photo realistic 3D animated avatars. Their service creates personalized 3D avatars based off of your 2D profile
